case_title: Mst. Allah Rakhi vs Murid Hussain Shah and Others

key_issues.issue_1: Insufficiency of court-fee stamp on the plaint
key_issues.issue_2: Locus standi of plaintiff to institute the suit
key_issues.issue_3: Applicability of custom or Muhammadan Law in matters of succession
key_issues.issue_5: Collateral relationship between Punun Shah and Noor Ali Shah
key_issues.issue_6_8_13_14: Validity and nature of the family settlement

judgment_summary.custom_vs_personal_law: Family governed by Muhammadan Law in matters of succession
judgment_summary.settlement_validity: Settlement void due to lack of proper stamping and registration
judgment_summary.locus_standi: Plaintiff had the right to sue based on undue influence and improper documentation

execution_order.decree: Murid Hussain Shah to regain 20 squares of land from Mst. Allah Rakhi
execution_order.costs: Each party to bear their own costs
